Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/Negation

Syntax - Exp
Types
Exp - Exp
int int
real real
Description Yields the negated values of Exp.
Examples 
rascal>-12
int: -12
rascal>-13.5
real: -13.5
rascal>- -12
int: 12
Questions
Question 1.
The type of -9 is

Question 2.
The type of -16.70967620251934400 is

Question 3. 
-6.77601716936986000 ==
